Notes: Should not be confused with catfight.
Gender: The gender of the combatants determines if the tag is placed in the female or male namespace. Male versus female uses the female namespace.

Name: x-ray
Description: Internal organs being visible through the skin or from the inside.
Gender: The gender of the one made visible inside determines if the tag is placed in the female or male namespace.

Name: yandere
Description: Psychotic behaviour motivated by obsessive love. This includes stalking or abducting the person of interest or intimidating or hurting perceived rivals. If there are any sexual activities the crazed participant must be directly involved in them at some point.
Gender: The gender of the one behaving psychotically determines whether the tag is placed in the male or female namespace.

Name: yaoi
Description: Sex between at least two males. Also permitted for any male-only galleries meant to have the same appeal.
Notes: Should not be tagged on non-h content (see males only).

Name: yukkuri
Description: Round blob-like creatures with faces based on characters from Touhou Project. Often involved in guro or torture.
Gender: Yukkuri are genderless.

Name: yuri
Description: Sex between at least two females.
Notes: Should not be tagged on futanari/shemale-on-female sex or on non-pornographic content. If there is a scene revealing that a character is a futanari later on then previous scenes can still count as yuri.

Name: zebra
Description: Any type of striped equine.
Notes: Should not be tagged on furry characters, use horse girl or horse boy.
Gender: The gender of the zebra determines if the tag is placed in the female or male namespace.

Name: zombie
Description: A fleshy undead creature.
Notes: Requires the monster [girl] tag. Does not invoke necrophilia.
Gender: The gender of the zombie determines if the tag is placed in the female or male namespace.
